clearExperiment

public void clearExperiment(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.sdo.EDataObject experiment)
                     throws ExperimentTaskException
This will cancel and clear the experiment. Clearing the experiment means to remove it from the list of acquired experiment.

Doing a cancel before the reset must be done to try to cancel/stop all resources (such as the update task) before removing the experiment all together.

Parameters:
experiment - the experiment which should be cleared.
Throws:
ExperimentTaskException - thrown if there is no task that corresponds to the given experiment.

hasRunningExperiments

public boolean hasRunningExperiments()
Returns:
True, if there is one or more experiments running (including acquired experiments). False otherwise.
